content: “You know, if we didn’t do a good job, if we weren’t competent, believe me, we wouldn’t be in this spot.” Why does that sound EXACTLY like: “I can’t be doing so badly, because I’m president and you’re not.” “A lot of people would say the same about — how could somebody successfully win the presidency who had never been engaged in politics?” (If I was interviewing her my immediate response would have been) “Are you prematurely Russian to conclusions?
